title: Pale Ale (Second Edition) (Classic Beer Style Series #16)
description:
Pale Ale: History, Brewing, Techniques, Recipes (Second Edition)

(Classic Beer Style Series #16)

By Terry Foster

Never before has the evolution of pale ale been so thoroughly explored. Terry Foster pays proper homage to this distinctive ale and the sub-styles it has spawned. This all-new revised and expanded edition includes a new section on American IPAâ€™s, pale ales and amber ales.

The Classic Beer Style Series from Brewers Publications examines individual world-class beer styles, covering origins, history, sensory profiles, brewing techniques and commercial examples.
